description: A Kotlin-based MCP-compatible tool that provides time utilities such as formatting, parsing, date calculation, and timezone conversion.

actions.name: addDays
actions.description: Adds the given number of days to the ISO date string

actions.name: addMinutes
actions.description: Adds the given number of minutes to the ISO date-time string

actions.name: addMonths
actions.description: Adds the given number of months to the ISO date string

actions.name: addYears
actions.description: Adds the given number of years to the ISO date string

actions.name: daysBetween
actions.description: Calculates the number of days between two ISO dates

actions.name: durationBetween
actions.description: Returns the duration between two ISO date-times as a string (e.g., PT5H30M)

actions.name: durationBreakdown
actions.description: Returns a breakdown of the duration between two ISO date-times (days, hours, minutes, seconds)

actions.name: hoursBetween
actions.description: Calculates the number of hours between two ISO date-times

actions.name: millisBetween
actions.description: Calculates the number of milliseconds between two ISO date-times

actions.name: minutesBetween
actions.description: Calculates the number of minutes between two ISO date-times

actions.name: secondsBetween
actions.description: Calculates the number of seconds between two ISO date-times

actions.name: subtractDays
actions.description: Subtracts the given number of days from the ISO date string

actions.name: subtractHours
actions.description: Subtracts the given number of hours from the ISO date-time string

actions.name: subtractSeconds
actions.description: Subtracts the given number of seconds from the ISO date-time string

actions.name: withEndOfDay
actions.description: Returns the end of day (23:59:59.999999999) for the given ISO date

actions.name: withStartOfDay
actions.description: Returns the start of day (00:00:00) for the given ISO date

actions.name: isAfter
actions.description: Returns true if the first ISO date is after the second one

actions.name: isAmNow
actions.description: Returns true if the current UTC time is before 12:00 (AM)

actions.name: isBefore
actions.description: Returns true if the first ISO date is before the second one

actions.name: isBetween
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is between start and end (inclusive)

actions.name: isBusinessDay
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is a weekday (Mon-Fri). Currently only supports weekends, not holidays.

actions.name: isFutureDate
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is in the future (after today, UTC)

actions.name: isLeapYear
actions.description: Returns true if the given year is a leap year

actions.name: isPastDate
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is in the past (before today, UTC)

actions.name: isPmNow
actions.description: Returns true if the current UTC time is 12:00 or later (PM)

actions.name: isSameDay
actions.description: Returns true if two ISO dates are the same day

actions.name: isSameMonth
actions.description: Returns true if two ISO dates are in the same month and year

actions.name: isSameYear
actions.description: Returns true if two ISO dates are in the same year

actions.name: isToday
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is today in UTC

actions.name: isValidDate
actions.description: Returns true if the given date string is valid according to the given pattern (e.g., yyyy-MM-dd)

actions.name: isWeekend
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is a weekend (Saturday or Sunday)

actions.name: dayNameToIndex
actions.description: Converts a day name to its index (0=Monday, 6=Sunday)

actions.name: getDayAfterToday
actions.description: Returns the day of the week N days after today (e.g., MONDAY)

actions.name: getDayOfWeek
actions.description: Returns the day of the week (e.g., MONDAY) for the given ISO date

actions.name: getDayOfWeekIndex
actions.description: Returns the index of the day of week for the given ISO date (0=Monday, 6=Sunday)

actions.name: getTodayDayIndex
actions.description: Returns the index of today's day of week (0=Monday, 6=Sunday)

actions.name: getTodayDayOfWeek
actions.description: Returns the current day of the week (UTC) as a string (e.g., TUESDAY)

actions.name: indexToDayName
actions.description: Converts an index (0=Monday, 6=Sunday) to the corresponding day name

actions.name: isWeekday
actions.description: Returns true if the given day name is a weekday (Monday to Friday)

actions.name: isWeekendDate
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date falls on a weekend (Saturday or Sunday)

actions.name: isWeekendDay
actions.description: Returns true if the given day name is a weekend (SATURDAY or SUNDAY)

actions.name: normalizeDayName
actions.description: Normalizes a day name string to a standard DayOfWeek enum (e.g., Mon -> MONDAY)

actions.name: formatLocalDate
actions.description: Formats the given LocalDate ISO string using the given pattern (e.g., MM-dd-yyyy)

actions.name: formatLocalDateTime
actions.description: Formats the given LocalDateTime ISO string using the given pattern (e.g., yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm)

actions.name: formatWithLocale
actions.description: Formats the given ISO date-time string using the given pattern and locale (e.g., en-US, fr-FR)

actions.name: isValidDateFormat
actions.description: Checks if the given date string is valid with the given pattern (e.g., 2025/04/17 with yyyy/MM/dd)

actions.name: parseDayOfWeek
actions.description: Parses the given ISO date string to a LocalDate and returns the day of week (e.g., MONDAY)

actions.name: parseToIso
actions.description: Parses the given date-time string with the given pattern into ISO-8601 format

actions.name: safeParseToIso
actions.description: Safely parses the date-time string using the given pattern. Returns null if parsing fails.

actions.name: getAllDatesInMonth
actions.description: Returns a list of all ISO dates in the month of the given date

actions.name: getEndOfCurrentMonth
actions.description: Returns the last day of the current month (UTC)

actions.name: getEndOfMonth
actions.description: Returns the last day of the month for the given ISO date

actions.name: getEndOfPreviousMonth
actions.description: Returns the last day of the previous month for the given ISO date

actions.name: getLengthOfMonth
actions.description: Returns the number of days in the month of the given ISO date

actions.name: getSpecificDayInMonth
actions.description: Returns the ISO date of a specific day in the same month as the given date (e.g., 15th)

actions.name: getStartOfCurrentMonth
actions.description: Returns the first day of the current month (UTC)

actions.name: getStartOfMonth
actions.description: Returns the first day of the month for the given ISO date

actions.name: getStartOfNextMonth
actions.description: Returns the first day of the next month for the given ISO date

actions.name: getWeekCountInMonth
actions.description: Returns the number of ISO weeks in the month of the given ISO date

actions.name: isEndOfMonth
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date is the last day of its month

actions.name: availableZoneIds
actions.description: Returns a list of all available zone IDs supported by the JVM

actions.name: currentEpochMillis
actions.description: Returns the current epoch time in milliseconds

actions.name: currentEpochSeconds
actions.description: Returns the current epoch time in seconds

actions.name: currentTimePartsUtc
actions.description: Returns current UTC time components (hour, minute, second, dayOfWeek)

actions.name: currentUtcOffset
actions.description: Returns the UTC offset for the given zone ID (e.g., +09:00)

actions.name: dayOfYearUtc
actions.description: Returns the current day of the year (1 to 365 or 366) in UTC

actions.name: nowFormatted
actions.description: Returns the current date and time formatted using the given pattern (e.g., yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm)

actions.name: nowInZone
actions.description: Returns the current time in the specified time zone in ISO-8601 format (e.g., Asia/Seoul)

actions.name: nowUtcIso
actions.description: Returns the current time in UTC in ISO-8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-17T02:25:00Z)

actions.name: nowUtcZoned
actions.description: Returns the current UTC ZonedDateTime object as a string

actions.name: todayInZone
actions.description: Returns the current date in the given time zone in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd)

actions.name: todayIso
actions.description: Returns the current date in UTC in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd)

actions.name: weekOfYearUtc
actions.description: Returns the current ISO week number of the year (UTC)

actions.name: getAllDatesOfWeek
actions.description: Returns a list of ISO date strings for all days in the week that includes the given ISO date

actions.name: getCurrentWeekOfYear
actions.description: Returns the current ISO week number of the year

actions.name: getDateFromWeekAndDay
actions.description: Returns the ISO date for a given ISO week number, year, and weekday index (0=Monday, 6=Sunday)

actions.name: getEndOfWeek
actions.description: Returns the end date (Sunday) of the week for the given ISO date

actions.name: getEndOfWeekByNumber
actions.description: Returns the end date (Sunday) of the given ISO week number and year

actions.name: getStartOfWeek
actions.description: Returns the start date (Monday) of the week for the given ISO date

actions.name: getStartOfWeekByNumber
actions.description: Returns the start date (Monday) of the given ISO week number and year

actions.name: getWeekOfYear
actions.description: Returns the ISO week number (1â€“53) of the year for the given ISO date

actions.name: getWeekdayOfFirstDay
actions.description: Returns the day of the week for the first day of the week that includes the given ISO date

actions.name: isEvenWeek
actions.description: Returns true if the ISO week number of the given ISO date is even

actions.name: isLastWeekOfMonth
actions.description: Returns true if the given ISO date falls in the last ISO week of its month

actions.name: isSameWeek
actions.description: Returns true if the two dates fall in the same ISO week of the year

actions.name: convertZone
actions.description: Converts the given ISO date-time from the source time zone to the target time zone

actions.name: getZoneOffset
actions.description: Returns the current UTC offset of the given time zone (e.g., +09:00)

actions.name: isDstActive
actions.description: Returns true if the given time zone is currently in daylight saving time (DST)

actions.name: isValidZoneId
actions.description: Checks whether the given time zone ID is valid

actions.name: timeInZone
actions.description: Returns the current local time in the given time zone (HH:mm:ss)

actions.name: toUtc
actions.description: Converts the given ISO date-time from the source time zone to UTC

actions.name: utcNowToZone
actions.description: Converts the current UTC time to the given time zone (ISO-8601 format)

actions.name: zoneOffsetDiff
actions.description: Returns the hour difference between two time zones at the current time
